nodes.text: I have been informed by Lady Moira that Herr Kyro will soon be fully recovered from his injuries.
I am pleased to announce that Herr Kyro has been rescued from the Catacombs. He is recovering now, but Lady Moira believes he can return to class in the next day or so.
What happened to him?

Apparently, Herr Kyro had been injured and attacked by a Wraith. Fortunately, he had some sort of magic that helped repel the creature. However, his life would have been lost had not Herr O'Conner found him.
Congratulations, Herr O'Conner. It seems that you have heroic qualities despite yourself.
I never would have found Joel without the help of Katie, Thomas, and Esme. They are all heroes as much as I am.
I knew it was my role to save Joel. Kyro needed a hero who wasn't afraid to face a Wraith to defend a friend.
Nice work, Shawn.
Yeah, Matey, you did good for a landlubber.
In honor of Herr Kyro's rescue, you will all have a little more spare time with which to practice your Rogue skills. The skills you master today may well save your life tomorrow.

nodes.name: Hey - I'm a Hero
nodes.description: It's kind of a nice feeling.

nodes.text: Good afternoon.
I regret to inform you that Herr Kyro is dead. Herr Kent found Joel's body in the Catacombs.
He might still be alive if I had but found him a little sooner.
What happened to Joel?

Apparently, Herr Kyro was exploring the Catacombs and was attacked by a Wraith. Lady Moira believes that when Joel tried to flee, he tripped and lost some of his magical protections as well as his sense of direction.
The Wraith eventually caught him.
How did you get to the Catacombs?

There's a secret passageway out of the castle that leads to the Sea Caves. A heavy gate with a complex lock separates the catacombs from the Sea Cave. I noticed that the lock had been recently picked, so I searched the Catacombs for Joel.
How did you find Joel in the catacombs?

I asked some of the friendlier creatures and spirits in the Catacombs for help. They told me that a Wraith had recently been disturbed from a tomb in the northeast section of the catacombs, and I found Joel there.

options.text: Make a Joke in Poor Taste

nodes.text: So for poor Kyro, exploring the catacombs was a grave mistake when he came to a dead end.
Your levity is singularly inappropriate at the moment.

nodes.message: Removing lots of reputation from Joel to reflect Joel being very angry with Shawn in the Ghost encounter.

nodes.name: Joel's Dead
nodes.description: I can't believe it. Poor guy.

nodes.text: You may have the rest of the afternoon off to mourn your lost classmate.
